name: places/ChIJJ__P_ftYwokRca9mN1MiM1Y
adrFormatAddress: 640 5th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I recently visited the Dyson demonstration store and had an incredibly positive experience. The store is well-stocked, featuring an extensive range of products from the latest vacuums to advanced hair dryers. What made my visit exceptional was the staff, particularly La Shawna. She was not only knowledgeable but also highly intuitive. Understanding that I preferred a quick decision-making process, she adeptly guided me through the options, helping me choose the perfect vacuum cleaner in no time.

Although there was a small mishap where La Shawna accidentally cut her finger on a tape gun, her professionalism and dedication didn't falter. I sincerely hope she's recovered well from the accident. For anyone interested in Dyson products and wanting to see them in action, I highly recommend this store. The combination of a diverse product range and attentive, efficient staff ensures a satisfying shopping experience.

originalText.text:
Update: The situation has deteriorated. Despite appearing responsive in their comments below, suggesting quick resolution upon receiving an email, Dyson has not yet acknowledged our email even after five days.

We had a very disappointing experience with our new Dyson cordless vacuum. The seal began to detach after only the second use. Additionally, the customer service has been extremely unsatisfactory. They insist on receiving the defective vacuum, along with all its accessories and the base, which we've already installed, before sending a replacement. Typically, companies would send a replacement first, trusting that the customer would return the faulty product. Furthermore, they didn't provide a box for shipping the item back, which means we will be without our expensive vacuum cleaner for at least two weeks. Consequently, we are now seeking a full refund and bitterly regret this purchase.

originalText.text: I walked in 15 minutes before closing and had two of the friendliest most welcoming staff helping me . They didnâ€™t rush me through and were happy to talk me through all the options/benefits of each product as I debated between the air strait and air wrap. I left confident in my choice of the air wrap and pleased with the whole experience. Also loved the 20 percent discount for trading in an old hair tool- an offer that prompted me to purchase sooner.

originalText.text: It's one of the best shopping experiences.  I was looking for a vacuum. Esmelki was very professional and helpful. He did very good demo for me.  Not only I got my v8 but I finally understood how to use all the tools. Actually , I have used Dayson for years but never figured out all the functions of those tools. High recommended walk in the store to check.
